title: Hope
description:
Linda Bailey Walsh, Pollo Corral and Mara Wiles share about times they were in very tough spots, but never gave up.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Linda Bailey Walsh, Mara Wiles, Herizen Guardiola, The Americanos, Nile Rodgers, Wynton Marsalis, Pollo Corral, Wheeland Brothers, Kevin Allison)
